column1: NGR is Inglefield. Altitudes match. 2 overlapping gauges seem to be same location.
1920s record says May reading copied form Mount Grace (which is next door). Comparing stations Feb to May 1920 and Oct 1921 are the same as Mount Grace therefore removed
There are 8 duplicated monthly readings (out of 47) when the gauges overlap in the 1910s, but the readings are generally close so probably not an issue
